item.title: Election Facebook Ad Campaign Analysis: Trump vs. Harris
item.description:
Project Overview

This project analyzes the advertising strategies employed by Donald Trump and Kamala Harris during the 2024 U.S. presidential campaign using data from the Facebook Ad Library. By focusing on six key flipped states—Michigan, Nevada, Georgia, Pennsylvania, Wisconsin, and Arizona—the study identifies patterns in ad spend, impressions, and audience engagement.

Goal: Evaluating advertising campaign performance and analyzing demographic targeting differences between Trump and Harris campaigns to understand their relative effectiveness.
